description: Option + D to run AppleScript (Hide and Minimize Finder)

to.shell_command: osascript -e 'tell application "Finder" to activate' -e 'tell application "System Events" to keystroke "h" using {command down, option down}' -e 'tell application "Finder" to activate' -e 'tell application "System Events" to keystroke "m" using {command down, option down}'
